title: Quantity vs Invoice Date Trend
description: Visualize the trend of quantity over invoice dates
request_sql: SELECT invoicedate, COUNT(*) as total_quantity FROM data GROUP BY invoicedate ORDER BY invoicedate ASC

title: Quantity Distribution by Country
description: Show the distribution of quantity across different countries
request_sql: SELECT country, AVG(quantity) as avg_quantity FROM data GROUP BY country ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC

title: Unit Price vs Quantity Correlation
description: Visualize the correlation between unit price and quantity

title: Top Selling Stockcodes
description: Identify the top selling stockcodes based on quantity
request_sql: SELECT stockcode, SUM(quantity) as total_sales FROM data GROUP BY stockcode ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 10

title: Quantity Trend Over Time (Monthly)
description: Visualize the quantity trend over time grouped by month
request_sql: SELECT DATE_PART('month', invoicedate) as month, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM data GROUP BY month ORDER BY month ASC

title: Customer ID vs Quantity Distribution
description: Show the distribution of quantity across different customer IDs
request_sql: SELECT customerid, AVG(quantity) as avg_quantity FROM data GROUP BY customerid ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC LIMIT 10

title: Unit Price Trend Over Time (Monthly)
description: Visualize the unit price trend over time grouped by month
request_sql: SELECT DATE_PART('month', invoicedate) as month, AVG(unitprice) as avg_unitprice FROM data GROUP BY month ORDER BY month ASC

title: Quantity by Country and Stockcode
description: Show the distribution of quantity for each stockcode across different countries
request_sql: SELECT country, stockcode, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM data GROUP BY country, stockcode ORDER BY total_quantity DESC

title: Average Quantity by Stockcode and Month
description: Visualize the average quantity sold for each stockcode per month
request_sql: SELECT DATE_PART('month', invoicedate) as month, stockcode, AVG(quantity) as avg_quantity FROM data GROUP BY stockcode, month ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC, month ASC

title: Top Purchasing Countries
description: Identify the countries with the most customer IDs
request_sql: SELECT country, COUNT(DISTINCT customerid) as num_customers FROM data GROUP BY country ORDER BY num_customers DESC LIMIT 10
